sentences: Daniel Stabrawa (born 23 August 1955 in Kraków) is a Polish violinist and conductor.
Daniel Stabrawa began playing the violin at the age of seven and studied playing the violin at the Music Academy in Kraków with Zbigniew Szlezer.
In 1979 he became concertmaster of the Polish Radio Symphony Orchestra in Kraków.
In 1983 he joined the first violins of the Berlin Philharmonic.
In 1985 he founded the internationally renowned Philharmonia Quartet Berlin together with three colleagues from the Berlin Philharmonic.
Since 1994 Daniel Stabrawa acts also as a conductor.
Together with her and several other string musicians in 2008 he founded the Stabrawa Ensemble Berlin.
